channel.title: Aly K Kent
channel.description: Recent content on Aly K Kent

item.title: about
item.description: About Me: I’m a full-time student at San Francisco State University, majoring in Business Administration with a marketing concentration. I’m pursuing courses in business communication, consumer behavior, and marketing research. Energized by my passion for psychology, I can empathize with the customer by understanding their needs and how the product can bring value to their lives. Outside of SFSU, I continuously research the latest marketing trends and take relevant coursework to further my professional development.
